purpleculture_pinyin:
dǒu
steep; precipitous; abrubtly; suddenly; unexpectedly
отвесный; обрывистый; резко; вдруг, внезапно; неожиданно
purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 平
Pictophonetic: 走 indicates the sound; 阝 (hill) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
陡然 [ dǒu rán ]: suddenly; unexpectedly; abruptly; precipitously; stumbling
陡峭 [ dǒu qiào ]: precipitous
陡坡 [ dǒu pō ]: steep incline; water chute; sluice
陡壁 [ dǒu bì ]: steep cliff; precipice; vertical slope
陡变 [ dǒu biàn ]: to change precipitously
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
    • 走 [ zǒu ] to walk, to run, to flee
heisig_chinese_memo: It's nice to walk around the Pinnacle.  You can walk on the flat ground or choose neighborhoods with steep slopes.
Ru_trainchinese: dǒu: (графема) крутой, отвесный; (книжн.) неожиданно, вдруг
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: It's nice to walk around the Pinnacle.  You can walk on the flat ground or choose neighborhoods with steep slopes.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Fu ", " Go " sound. The original meaning is that the mountain is steep, and it is also called "阧." "Jade articles. "Fubu": "Yun, Jun Ye." "Ji Yun. "Hou Yun": "Fan, stand tall, or go from there." For example, Lin Zi of the Tang Dynasty "Wang Jiuhua Mountain": "The empty center begins to be astonished by the giant spirit, and the steep place is suddenly shocked and foolish." Chapter 2 of "Journey to the West": "It turns out that before the cliff, it was the dirty cave."

" Steep " means suddenly and suddenly, as in the Southern Song Dynasty Wang Xin's "Remembering Qin'e": "The village north and south, the night comes suddenly and the frost and wind are rushing." "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 79: "Daiyu suddenly changed color after hearing this."

" Steep " also means a deep degree, such as the first fold of the fifth book of The West Chamber by Wang Shifu in the Yuan Dynasty: "I was thin once, but I was still idle every time. This time is the steepest."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Fu ", " Go " sound. The original meaning is that the mountain is steep, and it is also called "阧."
humanum_full_description:
從「阜」，「走」聲。本義是山勢峻峭，又作「阧」。《玉篇．阜部》：「阧，峻也。」《集韻．厚韻》：「阧，峻立也，或从走。」如唐代林滋〈望九華山〉：「虛中始訝巨靈擘，陡處乍驚愚叟移。」《西遊記》第2回：「原來那陡崖之前，乃是那水臟洞。」

　　「陡」表示突然、頓時，如南宋汪莘〈憶秦娥〉：「村南北，夜來陡覺霜風急。」《紅樓夢》第79回：「黛玉聽了，陡然變色。」

　　「陡」亦表示程度深，如元代王實甫《西廂記》第五本第一摺：「曾經消瘦，每遍猶閒，這番最陡。」
humanum_short_description: 從「阜」，「走」聲。本義是山勢峻峭，又作「阧」。

Chinese: It's nice to walk around the Pinnacle. You can walk on the flat ground or choose neighborhoods with steep slopes.
Meaning: steep
Story: It's nice to walk around the Pinnacle. You can walk on the flat ground or choose neighborhoods with steep slopes.
Kind: both

從「 阜 」，「 走 」聲。本義是山勢峻峭，又作「 阧 」。《玉篇．阜部》：「阧，峻也。」《集韻．厚韻》：「阧，峻立也，或从走。」如唐代林滋〈望九華山〉：「虛中始訝巨靈擘，陡處乍驚愚叟移。」《西遊記》第2回：「原來那陡崖之前，乃是那水臟洞。」 「 陡 」表示突然、頓時，如南宋汪莘〈憶秦娥〉：「村南北，夜來陡覺霜風急。」《紅樓夢》第79回：「黛玉聽了，陡然變色。」 「 陡 」亦表示程度深，如元代王實甫《西廂記》第五本第一摺：「曾經消瘦，每遍猶閒，這番最陡。」
From " Fu", " Go" sound. The original meaning is that the mountain is steep, and it is also called " 阧." "Jade articles. "Fubu": "Yun, Jun Ye." "Ji Yun. "Hou Yun": "Fan, stand tall, or go from there." For example, Lin Zi of the Tang Dynasty "Wang Jiuhua Mountain": "The empty center begins to be astonished by the giant spirit, and the steep place is suddenly shocked and foolish." Chapter 2 of "Journey to the West": "It turns out that before the cliff, it was the dirty cave." " Steep" means suddenly and suddenly, as in the Southern Song Dynasty Wang Xin's "Remembering Qin'e": "The village north and south, the night comes suddenly and the frost and wind are rushing." "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 79: "Daiyu suddenly changed color after hearing this." " Steep" also means a deep degree, such as the first fold of the fifth book of The West Chamber by Wang Shifu in the Yuan Dynasty: "I was thin once, but I was still idle every time. This time is the steepest."

陡字的基本解释

陡
dǒu
斜度很大，近于垂直：陡坡。陡峭。陡立。陡峻。
突然：陡然。陡变。

陡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǒu］
［《廣韻》當口切，上厚，端。］
(1)山势峻峭。
(2)顿时；突然。
(3)程度深，范围广。
(4)抖。哆嗦。
(5)抖。神气得意。

陡字的英文翻译

◎ 陡
precipitous, steep

陡字的源字形

陡字的起名意思

意为坡度很大，近于垂直。也有顿时，突然等含义。

(4) Shaking. Shivering.

①坡度大,近于垂直:~峭|~坡|~立。2突然:~然|

отвесный
Пиктофонетические символы.
B (Fu) означает, что Fu относится к горе, и склон горы близок к вертикали, которая крута; ходьба (z6u) выражает звук, а также показывает, что склон крутой и нет возможности идти .
Первоначальный смысл крутой.
①Склон большой и близкий к вертикали: ~ обрыв | ~ склон | ~ стоящий.
2 Вдруг: ~ побежал |

dǒu
прил./наречие
1) крутой, отвесный; обрывистый; круто
这个路太陡, 车上去要小心 эта дорога очень крутая, ехать на машине надо осторожно
2) внезапный; резкий; внезапно, резко; вдруг, неожиданно
